TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit SecurityPermission extends System.Security.CodeAccessPermission implements class System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission
Public NotInheritable Class SecurityPermission Inherits CodeAccessPermission Implements IUnrestrictedPermission
public ref class SecurityPermission sealed : System::Security::CodeAccessPermission, System::Security::Permissions::IUnrestrictedPermission
type SecurityPermission = class inherit CodeAccessPermission interface IUnrestrictedPermission

summary.span: Describes a set of security permissions applied to code.

span.span: Describes a set of security permissions applied to code.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Questa autorizzazione viene utilizzato il enumerazione.This permission uses the enumeration. I valori per questa enumerazione è reperibile nella relativa documentazione.The values for this enumeration can be found in its documentation.

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with either restricted or unrestricted permission as specified.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with either restricted or unrestricted permission as specified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Consente di definire con restrizioni (`None`) o `Unrestricted` l'accesso a tutte le autorizzazioni di sicurezza.Creates either fully restricted (`None`) or `Unrestricted` access to all security permissions.

remarks.format: ## Examples Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato l'utilizzo del costruttore per creare istanze del classe utilizzati per la richiesta di autorizzazioni di sicurezza.The following code example shows the use of the constructor to create instances of the class that are used to demand security permissions. summary.span: Creates and returns an identical copy of the current permission.

span.span: Creates and returns an identical copy of the current permission.

returns.span: A copy of the current permission.

span.span: A copy of the current permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Una copia di un'autorizzazione rappresenta lo stesso accesso alle risorse dell'autorizzazione originale.A copy of a permission represents the same access to resources as the original permission.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Security::Permissions::SecurityPermissionFlag Flags { System::Security::Permissions::SecurityPermissionFlag get(); void set(System::Security::Permissions::SecurityPermissionFlag value); };

span.span: The state of the current permission, represented by a bitwise OR combination of any permission bits defined by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Singoli bit di autorizzazione può essere determinato mediante l'esecuzione di un'operazione AND su questo valore e la verifica della diverso da zero.Individual permission bits can be determined by performing an AND operation against this value and checking for nonzero.

param.name: target

span.span: A permission to intersect with the current permission.

param.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission.

span.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

span.span: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: A new permission object that represents the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

span.span: A new permission object that represents the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: This new permission is if the intersection is empty.

span.span: This new permission is if the intersection is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Il risultato dell'intersezione delle due autorizzazioni è un'autorizzazione che descrive lo stato comune a entrambe.The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the state that they both describe in common. Solo una richiesta che supera entrambe le autorizzazioni originali passerà l'intersezione.Only a demand that passes both original permissions will pass the intersection.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool IsSubsetOf(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function IsSubsetOf (target As IPermission) As Boolean

param.name: target
param.span: A permission that is to be tested for the subset relationship.

span.span: A permission that is to be tested for the subset relationship.

param.span: This permission must be of the same type as the current permission.

span.span: This permission must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.

span.span: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.

returns.span: if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

span.span: if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Se l'autorizzazione corrente specifica un set di operazioni che è interamente contenuto all'autorizzazione specificata, l'autorizzazione corrente è un subset di quella specificata.The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission specifies a set of operations that is wholly contained by the specified permission. Ad esempio, un'autorizzazione che rappresenta l'accesso a C:\example.txt è un subset di un'autorizzazione che rappresenta l'accesso in c:\\.For example, a permission that represents access to C:\example.txt is a subset of a permission that represents access to C:\\. Se questo metodo restituisce `true`, l'autorizzazione corrente non rappresenta un accesso alla risorsa protetta rispetto all'autorizzazione specificata.If this method returns `true`, the current permission represents no more access to the protected resource than does the specified permission.

exception.span: The parameter is not and is not of the same type as the current permission.

span.span: The parameter is not and is not of the same type as the current permission.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool IsUnrestricted() cil managed

summary.span: Returns a value indicating whether the current permission is unrestricted.

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether the current permission is unrestricted.

returns.span: if the current permission is unrestricted; otherwise, .

span.span: if the current permission is unrestricted; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Un'autorizzazione senza restrizioni rappresenta l'accesso a tutte le risorse protette dall'autorizzazione.An unrestricted permission represents access to any and all resources protected by the permission.

Public Overrides Function Union (target As IPermission) As IPermission

param.name: target
param.span: A permission to combine with the current permission.

span.span: A permission to combine with the current permission.

param.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission.

span.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: Creates a permission that is the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

span.span: Creates a permission that is the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

returns.span: A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

span.span: A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Il risultato di una chiamata a è un'autorizzazione che rappresenta tutte le operazioni rappresentate dall'autorizzazione corrente e l'autorizzazione specificata.The result of a call to is a permission that represents all the operations represented by both the current permission and the specified permission. Qualsiasi richiesta che supera l'autorizzazione per passa l'unione.Any demand that passes either permission passes their union.
